actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 96-109.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #196 (276-14).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 721 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend section 106 of the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to raise the limitation on appropriations for the United States Commission on Civil Rights.
short_title: Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1979

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 96-109) Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1979 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1980 for the Civil Rights Commission.

titles.title: Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1979
A bill to amend section 106 of the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to raise the limitation on appropriations for the United States Commission on Civil Rights.
